goesToTray.title: Goes to Tray
goesToTray.message: App Manager is still running in the background.

exitDuringWork.title: Exit During Work
exitDuringWork.message: App Manager is still running in the background because it is working. It will be closed when the work is done.

exitDuringAppRun.title: Exit During App Run
exitDuringAppRun.message: App Manager is still running in the background because an app is running. It will be closed when the app is closed.

updateDone.title: Update Done
updateDone.message: The update has been successfully installed.

appExecFailed.title: App Launch Failed
appExecFailed.message:
An error occurred while launching %s.
Try to edit the launch command in the advanced app settings.
Error: %s
